ValidationRule.description: SDT-32136-Validation created to run check on Vendor Commit Date is not null to null
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISBLANK( PRIORVALUE( Vendor_Commit_Date__c ) ) ) , ISBLANK(Vendor_Commit_Date__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Vendor Commit Date cannot be set to null when it is not null
